title: La passagère du 54 (The Passenger from 54)
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Henri Marie Raymond de Toulouse-Lautrec [1864-1901]. Charles Sessler, Philadelphia, PA, until February 1951; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. [1898-1993] James H. Beal, Pittsburgh, PA, February 3, 1951 until December 19, 1955 [1]; their gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1955 [2]. 

Notes:
[1]. See original documentation from Mrs. Beal in curatorial file.
[2]. The lithograph was listed on May 5, 1955 among a group of items at Carnegie Institute belonging to Mrs. Beal. It was accessioned by the museum on December 19, 1955.
